results.name: Decimal expansion of the sum of the reciprocals of the dodecahedral numbers (A006566).
xref: Sums of inverses: A152623 (tetrahedral numbers), A002117 (cubes), A175577 (octahedral numbers), A175578 (icosahedral numbers).
